column14: I ordered a 3 pack from 2 different sellers. This one was extremely watered down. There’s no way this in the real soap. The ones from the other seller were exactly what it’s supposed to be.

column6: Very runny! No scent, The same product other places is thicker so why is this so watery??
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2018
column14: This is an absolute scam.  This has to be a joke, I recieved this and it's pure water in the bottle! No smell, super runny! The same exact product at Walmart is thick with a strong scent that lasts all day. Please send 3 new bottles of the correct soap! Please give me my money back!

column14: Should’ve read the reviews first... compared my old original bottle from the stores and after a wash... there’s no scent here and it’s just a water down version.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2018
column14: I've bought this exact soap many times and never had this problem. When I went to use the soap today it's almost like half of it got dumped out and replaced with water. it was super runny and not at all what I have come to expect. I'm going to throw out the rest of the soap because I'm super sketched out that it's been tampered with!

column14: Was very happy when I got this in. I had used the charcoal and was equally impressed with this one. Smells awesome and lasts a long time. Recommended to everyone I know

column14: Love this stuff. Part of my job is working on cars so of course I’m always dirty. After using dish soap to wash the deep stuff off my hands, this works great getting everything else off my face and arms. Also I love the scent. Smells great
